meta.title: Fun Things to Do at NYC's Rockefeller Center | Iconic NYC Attractions
meta.description: Rock Center has the best things to do in NYC this spring. Top attractions, best skyline views from the Top of the Rock, The Rink, Rainbow Room, art, history, great dining and shopping.

onlyHereHero.title: Iconic Experiences.
onlyHereHero.caption: There’s something special about every moment you spend at Rockefeller Center. From the historic art and architecture to the observation deck, you can experience New York this spring in a way that can only happen here.

image.alt: Girl looks through a viewfinder at the Top of the Rock

cards.title: Top of the Rock
cards.caption: 3 decks, 360-degree must see views, a city that’s all yours.

image.alt: Ice skating at The Rink by the Rock Center Christmas Tree and Prometheus statue.

cards.title: The Rink
cards.caption: The best traditions are those you experience with others. Skate the Rink.

cards.title: Rockefeller Center Tour
cards.caption: Get a unique look at a place unlike any other. Learn about this historic landmark’s architecture, art, and more.

image.alt: Rooftop cocktail bar with a NYC skyline view.

cards.title: Bar SixtyFive
cards.caption: Come for drinks and a view. Both will far exceed your expectations.

image.alt: Private event in NYC's historic Rainbow Room event space.

cards.title: Rainbow Room
cards.caption: The epitome of New York glamour and elegance. Enjoy private events with the city lights as your backdrop.

image.alt: Music performance at a luxury private event venue in Rockefeller Center.

cards.title: Private Event Spaces
cards.caption: Big or small, every event held here is a landmark occasion.

image.alt: Rock Center has unique NYC wedding venues with the best Manhattan views.

cards.title: Weddings
cards.caption: This is the height of romance. Our wedding event spaces offer the perfect settings, from intimate to over the top.

image.alt: The famous Rockefeller Center Christmas Tree and Prometheus sculpture by The Rink.

fullCard.title: The Holidays
fullCard.description: Celebrate the holidays with us. With a full slate of family events and activities, including the Tree Lighting and skating at The Rink, you’ll be a part of cherished traditions that attract visitors from around the world.

crossLinks.title: Community

image.alt: A singer performs for well-dressed audience under chandeliers.

crossLinks.caption: Each day is an opportunity to celebrate the diverse and vibrant people who make Rockefeller Center great––including you.

crossLinks.title: Culture

image.alt: Children having fun at Rockefeller Center.

crossLinks.caption: Experience the best of New York’s art and entertainment in an atmosphere where community and creativity collide.
